verses.name: 1 Samuel 4:4
verses.text: So the people sent to Shiloh, that they might bring from thence the ark of the covenant of the Lord of hosts, which dwelleth between the cherubims: and the two sons of Eli, Hophni and Phinehas, were there with the ark of the covenant of God.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 4:5
verses.text: And when the ark of the covenant of the Lord came into the camp, all Israel shouted with a great shout, so that the earth rang again.
